divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving past the high school in Cortez and turned north. I caught a glimpse of light to the east and saw quite a few flashing lights in a random pattern. It only lasted a few seconds, long enough to ask my son if he saw it too. As soon as he acknowledged he had, they disappeared. It was like they were never there, it was a clear night with no cloud cover. We were in awe, and were confused by what we saw. But excited at the same time.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Cortez
There were no other sightings in Cortez on or around January 6th 2012
Summary: Several blinking lights in a random pattern
